These shorts are very flattering and hug you in all the right places. The fabric is very lightweight with the right amount of stretch making them perfect for hot weather. The high waist is a plus as it tucks in the tummy area. These look super cute with a crop top for a contemporary look or with a t-shirt, button-down  or cami  for a classic look. These would even be great for working out at the gym! The only negative (hence 4 stars) is they do not have pockets.
